text: Section 28-4804.09 applies to a trust described in ยง 28-4804.09(d) on and after the following dates:
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

DC CODE ยง 28-4806.03

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: If the trust is not funded as of [July 23, 2010], the date of the decedent's death;
If the trust is initially funded in the calendar year beginning January 1, 2010, the date of the decedent's death; or
If the trust is not described in paragraph (1) or (2) of this section, January 1, 2010.

chapter.text: Principal and Income; Uniform Law. (Refs & Annos)
